data.persona: Working on my art makes me extremely happy. I love to paint the scenery of my village, the beautiful views of nature around me. I am financed by the king, so I often work in the palace, making art for the royals.
data.description:
You are in the Cave.
This cave is big but has no lights. It is made from stone and has a small pool of water in the back. The floor is made from dirt.
There's a dirt, an a small pool of water, a the village, a small pool of water, a stone, a mud, and a floor here.
The fruit bat is here.

You are carrying a Paintbrush and a Easel, and wearing a hats, a Jacket, and a shirt.
